DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , prospective , observational study evaluate quality life factor influence quality life epoetin beta [ Neorecormon ] patient renal chronic anemia , dialysis . For eligible patient data collect 6 month . Target sample size 5000-7000 patient .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Epoetin Beta Neorecormon Evaluate Quality Life Patients Dialysis With Chronic Renal Anemia
DOC.criteria: Adult patient > /=18 year age Dialysis patient chronic renal anemia Written inform consent Red blood cell transfusion previous 2 month Severe neuropsychological disorder Diabetic patient serious complication This trial conduct Morocco .
